name: Global Research Conference on Nursing and Health Care Management
content: Global Research Conference on Nursing and Health Care Management (GRCNH2024) welcomes all the attendees, presenters, associations and exhibitors from all over the world September 26-28, 2024 in Munich, Germany. This Congress Committee is gearing up for an exciting and informative conference program including plenary lectures, symposia, workshops on informative topics, poster presentations and various programs for participants from all over the world.
